description: KC 4" Gravity LED Fog Light Pair pack System is a Street Legal performance LED Fog light system that meets SAE (US) and E-Mark/ECE (Europe) Street legal specifications. This product comes with a pair of 4" Gravity LED Fog Lights (20W total). The best part about this performance LED light system is that it's 100 percent street legal so you get performance without the worry about turning on the LED lights on normal surface streets. This lighting system includes everything you need to install these performance LEDs on your Jeep, Truck, SUV and more.
